channel.title: Subtitle issue.
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is a bug or not, so I thought I'd check, the intro with the 'Good morning' speech isn't subtitled, I haven't seen a subtitled bit yet so whether or not it's the subtitles themselves or that bit alone just wasn't subtitled, I'm not sure. Just wanted to bring it up.
EDIT.
Other captions do work, guess the intro speech just wasn't given any.
-

item.title: Subtitle issue.
item.dc:creator: qabRieL
item.description:
Yes, train ride doesn’t show up in here too, though it’s written in the file.

Read full topic
